babel-desc: toki #babel la ilo li ken e poki sona lon lipu jan. ni li ken sona toki li ken sona ante kin.
babel-autocreate-reason: ilo [[$1|Babel]] li lon e lipu kulupu ni
babel-autocreate-text-levels: jan li lon kulupu ni la sona ona pi toki $2 li nanpa $1.
babel-autocreate-text-main: jan li lon kulupu ni la ona li sona toki $1.
babel-5: mi kepeken [[$2|$3]] [[$1|lon pali]] mi. pali ni li wile e sona wawa a pi $3.
babel-2-n: mi [[$1|sona pi ike ala]] e [[$2|toki pona]].
babel-4-n: mi [[$1|sona pi pona wawa]] e [[$2|toki pona]].
babel-5-n: mi kepeken [[$2|toki pona]] [[$1|lon pali]] mi. pali ni li wile e sona wawa a pi toki pona.
